values:
okay so enough with the rain already. we managed to open for part of the day on saturday and yesterday. but not the whole day. and well today is my day off. not like i haven't had enough days off but yeah. 

so everyday it rained i pretty much went to chris's house. yesterday i was so glad i had chris drive us to his house cause on the way it started raining so hard we couldn't see. and well i would of been way too scared to drive in that. so forget that. 

got up early this morning. tooo much noise. so i cleaned some. waiting to see if michelle needs a ride to work. i feel like a taxi. i drive everyone around. and i even get gas money. so i don't mind driving people around. as long as i get money to fill up the tank again. i am cool with it. i think today me, chris and hopefully britt are hanging out. maybe bowling or miniture golf or something, who knows. 

okay so last night i got home at like 10. and i waited outside my house for like 5 minutes. just because i was trying to get a big huge frog off the door nob. it wouldn't leave. no matter what i did. so i started to pound on the door. my dad opened it i was like "open it slow there is a huge frog on it" so he slammed it shut on me. then he opened it again "its still there" so it got slammed again in my face. then he came out with a broom and chased it down the stairs. crazy people. 

oh... funny story time! 

so i have been spending a lot of time with chris. but who cares we are friends and we aren't doing anything wrong. so who gives a crap right. well our parents do, and everyone at work. its constantly are you two an item now? are you two dating? whats going on between you two?... ect. we are just friends. yes i am sure it looks like we are more than just friends. maybe we are who knows. yes i do like him more than just friends but that doesn't matter. so saturday me, chris, brittany, john, joe and beverly were standing outside of work talking about if we were gonna open or not. it was like 10 something. chris and i had are arms around each other. we see a slow moving car. joe was like i think we got a customer. i looked... i was like nope... that's my dad. chris's arm flew off me so fast. it was funny. after work my parents were home. "so sam, who were you on the phone with this morning?" "depends on what time you are talking about" "who were you on the phone with" "both chris and brittany" "ohhh" "whose chris?" "my friend" "how old is he" "17" "who have you been hanging out with everyday?" "chris" "is he your boyfriend" "no, we are just friends" "sure..... its okay if he is your boyfriend" "okay, but he's not" "then why was his arm around you" "cause we are friends" "friends normally dont have there arms around each other like you guys did today" "okay" "so who is in denial?" "no one" "sure, its either you two are gonna end up dating or you three are gonna have a three sum" :::look like what the hell did you just say::: "you didn't just say that" and i walked away. yes my parents really did say that. shocking huh? sorry but i think the 3 of us will pass on the 3sum. crazy parents. 

oh another funny story. last night i was at chris's house. what a surprise right? we were watching movies and playing video games like always. and then we had dinner. chris's mom likes cookie cutters. she cut everyone's biscuts into different things. she cut mine and chris's into hearts. yeah, i think our parents are having too much fun with this.

okay so i got some news for you all. some may like it others wont. i know most of you are gonna be surprised but i dont want to explane it in my livejournal. so if you want the reason behind it call me or im me or email me and i'll give you all the info. please don't hate me. don't be mad at me. just listen and accept it. 

i am not moving. i am staying down here for my senior year. i'll be up in ohio to visit often though cause well i love my friends and my family and i can't last a long time without seeing them. you guys know that.

okay haven't updated in a while...... went on spring break back up to ohio. had a kick ass time. miss everyone up there. i love you guys! loved it all. wish i was still there. hate florida. but i would probably die if i didn't have some friends down here. who are awesome. added more pictures to my photobucket. so go check them out. had a shitty birthday on april 7. but whats new with that. birthday's always suck for me. so o'well. i give up. got my licence but can't drive cause my dad is a fucking ass hole. whats new with that. got a new job. make good money. work at a car wash. a lot tanner now. school sucks. work everyday after school and open to close on weekends. this saturday i work open to close then i have prom. then i have to work open on to close on sunday. yeah i am gonna die. i am helping at prom. that should be interesting. thats about all, i am done. wait survey..

I LEAVE TONIGHT!!!!!
i can't wait! i think i drove everyone insane today with "i'm leaving tonight" or counting down in hours and minutes. lol. i am just so happy i am going home for break. it is gonna be awesome. i really can't wait. i am soooooo hyper. i can't wait to see you all. we gotta hang out! sammy really really wants to hang out and have fun! so people we gotta get together!

i am going home!!!!! wednesday i leave for home! yay. i am gonna get to cleveland on friday and i am there until april 1! yay. about a week. not bad. then about 2 months later i move home. forever and ever! i can't wait. i miss everyone soooo much. i can't wait to hang out with everyone! yay. 

oh just to let everyone know i got a new email and screen name.

email: blueyedcutie4789@aol.com
sn: blueyedcutie4789

i am so tired. work was really really busy today. and i have blisters on my feet now. ouchies! i wanted to sleep in today. cause i didn't have to go to work until 12. but no the god damn sun woke me up. grr! does it not know i need sleep. anyways i gotta work tomorrow too. then babysit all week. then take the SAT on saturday. what fun. i am stressing so much. my ulcers are back. ugh. thanks stress for making my life difficult. so i am thinking after spring break i am gonna stop babysitting. because 1.) the kids add stress, 2.) 3 days after i get back i can work more a Publix, 3.) i really really can't handle two jobs, its killing me. so after break i am gonna change my availablity at Publix and no longer babysit. okay i think i am gonna go put on Napoleon Dynamite and go to bed and then get up tomorrow morning and go to work. i need a life. i hardly get to talk to my friends any more. i miss you guys! godd work is ruinning my life!

okay i was told i need to update. i guess it has been a while since i last updated. i normally update my xanga. so if u want to know whats going on with me check out my xanga. http://www.xanga.com/yourshortfriend4life

anyways... tooooooo much stress. too much school and work. 2 jobs, school, yeah you can say i have no life. i need a vacation. i can't wait for spring break. then the end of the year. and i am out of florida. and back home!

this weekend was pretty fun. until now. i went to play with my two lil turtles. to find one of them to be dead. :sad: Ace died. he was the baby. he was only the size of a quater and only 1 year old. i am really sad. now Darwin is all alone. he has no friends. my dad said i should get him a new friend. i am sooooo sad. R.I.P. Ace

okay so i have an offical moving date finally. thank god. spring break. yeah i wish it was sooner but with my dad this is as soon as i could get it. it's before my 16th bday. which is awesome. yay! ya know? Napoleon Dyanamite (Please rate my quiz) Which Napoleon Dynamite character are you? brought to you by Quizilla

so last night i bought a new digital/web cam. pretty cool. $28.50 on ebay! i love ebay. so now i am selling mine. and i gotta try to find like a babysitting job until i move cause publix is only giving me like 2.5 hours a week. which is bullshit! 

FINALS ARE OVER!!! THANK GOD!!!!  NO MORE FINALS FOR A WHILE!!! LETS CELEBRATE. LOL. 

okay enough of that. i gotta work tomorrow. 4-6:30. the only time i work all week. stupid publix. i am gonna try to talk to my dad again about moving. although it really doens't matter any more cause my mom is filing for coustodey of me and she did that for joe and got him. so my dad will more than likely lose again. hopefully i'll be back in ohio by early march. i am not gonna have another shitty birthday down here. i want to have it up there with everyone. i can't wait to be back there will all my friends, and to be closer to my family and my mom. i can't wait. i gotta come visit down here though cause of my dad. but thats alright its only visiting and mabye i can get one of my friends to come to. to the few florida friends i have i'll miss ya guys but when i come visit we can hang out. 

i want to start to pack now. but i gotta be patient. lol. i can't wait!

someone better freaken call me today! you all know my cell phone number. please call me!! if my dad picks up just ask for me. please call me!

okay.... so i don't know when i will be moving. me and my dad have been fighting about it since saturday. doesn't that sound fun? he is being such an ass about it. let me the fuck go. and be happy back home. i want to be happy. dammit. why doesn't he understand that. godd. i am really tired of this. i don't need to put up with this. my mom is fully capable of taking care of me. he needs to let me make my own damn choice. i am sorry but i have control of my life. i don't need him trying to control my life. its my damn life. not his. he screwed it up moving me here. now i want to fix it. so let me fucking fix it. he thinks it would be a huge mistake for me to move in with her. well if it is let me make that mistake. but i bet its not a mistake. the mistake was me moving down here. its the only thing i regret in life. and i want to fix it. i want a chance to be close to my mom. to be happy. to be back with the people who care about me and know me. he needs to let me grow up and make a decision for meselft. and let me do what i feel is best. he got his happyness. now he needs to let me get mine.

okay.... so i have noticed that a comment i have made in a previous entry has sparked some ideas and questions that to me don't see right cause we are friends and we should know each other better than that. but to clear things up here we go. the comment saying... "sorry jaime and aaron for waking you guys up" no aaron didn't sleep over. i called and woke him up. why would you guys even think that we'd have aaron sleep over jaime's house? seriuosly why? and i know that katie and joelle were mad or upset that they didn't get to say goodbye to me on the phone. you guys called me. i talked to you guys. we said bye. is there anything else. cause seriously let me know. i want to fix all this. and jaime isn't a whore. yeah she flirted and i know a lot of people think she was all over aaron. but if it were me doing that would you think the same. yeah i flirted. but i normally don't flirt a lot. everyone likes to flirt. everyone flirst a lot too. so someone please explain to me why is jaime a whore? and angela.... you said on the phone i guess we aren't doing anything today. i didn't know when i was leaving. i just knew it was suppose to be at 1. but that got delayed and aaron wanted to come over to say bye. thats it. i really wanted you to call me on sunday. i needed to talk to you. you are my best friend. and you know that. if there is something you are mad about and about me tell me. i want to know. but i wanted to tell you something important before everyone else found out cause joe is a blabber mouth and he knows. i am moving back to ohio. i am gonna live with joe and my mom. i wanted to tell you. angela call me this weekend. i am serious. even call me early in the morning but if you call me early in the morning call my house. i really need to talk to you.

so yeah... now it is 2005. wow another year went by. another year to come. i feel like i am writing a poem or something so i am gonna stop. 

so december 31 i woke up at 10! jaime and aaron you sould be proud of me. i would of slept longer but my brother called and woke me up. i am getting better. just give me some time. lol. 

i leave today to go back to florida. what a bummer. it sucks. my plane leaves at 3:15 pm. i fly to cleveland. then to florida. and i got school monday and finals. what fun. not really.

i had the best winter break ever! friends, family, snow, what more could i possibibly want? or need. lol. i am happy i got to see everyone. well almost everyone. maybe i'll see everyone else next time! 

happy new years everyone!

okay so far this has been the best winter break ever. i got just what i wanted for xmas. i got snow, cold, my family, and my friends! on xmas day i came to jaime's house! it has been awesome. but i am leaving today. saddness. i dont want to. these past couple of days have rocked, sledding, hanging out, project create, going and hanging out at angela's. all were awesome. i think i saw everyone too.... except.... eric, joelle, katie, mary, allysa, laura, and a couple of others. sorry maybe i'll see you guys next time! 

i know some people are mad about tonight. if you are let me know i want to talk about it. seriously. i wont get mad either. i just want to find out what you all were thinking and what not.

Merry Christmas Eve everyone and Merry Christmas for tomorrow and Happy Holidays for those who don't celebrate Christmas. 

To all my friends expecting to see me winter break I got some bad news for you all. I wont be able to come. The weather is bad and the streets are ice. I don't want anyone making a risk and driving in it. I really wish I could of came back and saw everyone. I really miss everyone a lot. But the weather isn't on my side and niether are the streets. It took me two hours of crying pretty much to make this decision last night. Hardest one to make too. But I don't want anyone one risking it or anything.I am sorry everyone. I don't know when i'll be back next. If my parents have their way then not for a long time. But if not then maybe this summer.

okay so tomorrow is the last day of school. then guess what?! it's christmas break. and sam (that would be me) gets to fly home! i am going to erie! yay. and then to ohio for a couple of days! i can't wait. i heard there is snow! yay! sam loves snow and misses it like hell! 

so lately when i've gone to the bus in the morning its only been in the 30s. which is  weird. no one knew florida could get that cold. lol. wednesday i wore my hat all day and didn't get into trouble. lol. and today i wore my elf hat all day. which we are also not aloud to do. but i have tons of christmas spirite. especially this year. 

so i need to know what my friends what for christmas. so leave me messages and comments or email me.
so... i got a couple of new pictures that i said when i got i'd post so here they are. let me know what ya'll think.

got up at 6:30. then went and took the SATs. only thing i got to say about that is "Fuck SATs". i had the worst headache afterwards. then i went to work. i am offcially burnt out and tired. collecting carts for a half hour. bagging and taking out groceries for the rest of the time. there were like 50 billion carts. and the weren't easy to get either. i swear its like a game trying to get them. and there were so many people. my feet really really hurt now. 

i work tomorrow. and then i dont work until probably next weekend. which i dont mind cause i got a lot of work for school to do this week. 

i need to know what my friends want for xmas... so mi amigos out there leave me messages for xmas.

okay....

today was my first day of actually working at my job. i am so tired. i like taking peoples groceries out to their cars. lol. gets me out of the craziness. lol. um.... i flirted with some of the cashiers lol. couldn't help it. and how do you make a publix uniform look cute? i was told i do. o'well. lol. it wasn't that bad. my feet just hurt cause of my shoes and i am tired cause its been on long ass day. lol. 

tomorrow i get to leave school for a lil for a doctors apointment. what fun. then back to school. hopefully i am back for lunch cause that is fun. i think i am going to go to bed early or fall asleep. lol. 

i dont want saturday to come. SATs then work then i come home and jeremy and josh will be here. what fun. not!

i got to talk to angie for a li today. its been like a month or longer since we talked. its weird. i just signed online and saw her sn and got all happy. but we didn't talk much. i miss our old convosations we use to have. i feel like me and her are growing apart and i dont want that to happen. she is the only person that actually knows like every little thing about me. she could probably write a book about me. i dont want to grow apart from her. she has helped me way to much. i wish we could talk more and see each other more. 

about 20 days until i fly to erie! yay. can't wait to be back there and be with my family. it is going to be awesome. and then i get to go to ohio and be with my friends! 

life is so difficult. it makes me sick sometimes. there are some people who have done nothing except try to make everyone else happy or done what they could to help and yet they are not happy themselves. then there are others that don't try to help others and just get whatever their hearts desire and they are happy. and then there are some people that just don't care. i want to be happy. its the only thing i ever wanted. i moved to florida to make my dad and step mom happy. i am always there when someone needs advice or someone to talk to or to just listen. and i try to cheer people up and always make sure they are alright. why can i do that for everyone else and not be happy myself? maybe i just wasn't ment to be. or maybe i am not looking hard enough? i dont know. i just hope someday i find my happyness. everyone deserves it.

Sam made turkey dinner last night! it turned out awesome. there was turkey, homemade gravey, homemade mashed potatos, corn, rolls, and sweet potatos. it was so freaken good. i can't believe how well it all turned out. i never made a thanksgiving dinner before. 

me and my dad got a long all day yesterday. i think it was cause pat had to work and so it was just me and him. it's gonna be like that for a while. so yay! tomorrow i have orientation from 9-4. fun fun fun. then monday i have a doctors apointment. and tuesday i have work from 3:30-6:30. i don't know what i work after that. but saturday i SATs. like 3 weeks until i fly to erie! and i am going to ohio on the 27th cause that's what jaime picked. lol. winter break is gonna be awesome! i can't wait!

um.... got a homecoming picture today. still need my other ones. my friend gave me this one. so here it is... when i get my other ones if they are better i'll post those.... and my ones from wakey day. um tomorrow i have to go over to publix to fill out paper work. doesn't that sound like fun. anyways only got 2 more days of school this week. thank god. its almost winter break! yay. and i am going to go to ohio for a couple of days. and i am staying with jaime cause she wants me to stay there lol. anyways i got to go. leave comments about how i looked for homecoming.

hm....

i got a job finally. monday i have to go fill out papers. and next saturday i get to go there for like 7 hours for orientation. doens't it sound like fun? yeah i am a bagger at publix. but hey its a paying job.

i am in digital design. we are suppose to be reading cause its friday and friday is dear day. so i am reading what i am typing.

sunday i get to decorate for xmas. for those of you who know me know i go crazy with decorating my room. this year i am going all out. i got a 32 inch fiberoptic tree. and i don't know what else i am doing yet. lol.

yesterday i was went to get the mail and i saw the biggest aflac duck ever. it was in someones car. it took up the whole front seat and backseat. i took pictures.

it's now less than a month until i fly to erie for winter break! yay. i can't wait. i got to figure out when i am coming to ohio. maybe i'll go the 27-30. i don't know. probably be the best time to go. don't know where i am staying. hopefully isn't too bad cause then i wont be able to come to ohio.

i can't wait for xmas. sunday when i am decorating i am gonna be listening to xmas music. i love xmas way too much. but thats alright. i just got a lot of holiday spirit. next week is thanksgiving. i got to figure out what i am gonna make myself for dinner. hm... i don't know. i will have to figure it out.

thanks becky for filling me in on everything. and for introducing me to laura. 

so i just met someone. her name is laura. we have a lot in commen. she is cool. the weird part is when i lived in ohio she lived on the street infront of me. but we never met. how weird is that? 

i got a letter today from angie! yay it made me so happy. and because of her i think i will be coming to ohio for a couple of days. as long as the weather is good. 

i am so tired. i think i am gonna go for now.

okay... once again the STEELERS WON! they beat the shitty browns. 24 - 10. to all of the browns fans that are reading this who is the best now biotchs?! lol. sorry about that. but the steelers are now 8 - 1 and if new england loses tonight then we will be # 1! yay. go us. STEELERS KICK ASS!

anyways aside from that... parents suck. i hate them. i really do. especially mine. um... my grandparents go back to erie tomorrow. i don't want them to. i am gonna miss 'em. especially my grandma. but i will see them in a month a long with the rest of my family that i miss so much. 

school pretty much sucks. but its the only time of the day that i actually have a life. the part of the day at school i actually enjoy are lunch and chemistry. the rest i could do without. 

um... don't know if i am gonna go back to ohio at all during winter break. no one seems to talk to me or return any phone calls or letters. so i don't know if i have anything to go back to. i miss everyone like hell but i am not sure anyone misses me or even notices i am not there. so i don't know. plus i think everyone is too busy with their own lifes and stuff like that. so i don't want to be in the way or anything. 

can't go back up north for summer vacation this year. which pisses me off majorly. i might be able to go to erie for a week or two. but not ohio. so if i dont go back to ohio winter break it wont be until i graduate that i will be back there. which i graduate may of 2006. not that far way! i can't wait to graduate. florida sucks and i want out. i hate this place and always will. and i don't like my parents! i want to go up north. where i belong and fit in. i miss it all!

no school today...

been really really bored. there is nothing to do when i don't have school. i really need a life. or a job. both would work for me. fa la la la la la la la la. i am so freaken bored. this really really sucks. this week has been pretty boring. everyone at school has been talking about the stupid homecoming that sucked. have to write a position paper for history comparing and contrasting the south slavery to the northern factory workers. shouldn't be too hard. but the bad part is we have to read them to the class. which is my weak spot. i hate talking infornt of groups of people. i am gonna be messing it up so badly. it sucks. hm... nothing more happening. i love having my grandparents down here. i like being around them. i would rather be around them then my parents. i can't wait for winter break. just to get away from them and florida. i don't know if i am gonna go to ohio. no one really talks to me any more. and when i call people no one is home and no one returns my messages. what's the point.  i think i am losing everything. i am starting to believe the "once you leave you can't go back." i don't know what to do.

*okay i have had a rather interesting week....

~okay i was sick from monday until yesterday. 
*i lost my voice and am stuck with a really annoying caugh that hurts my lungs. 
*i got my ride to homecoming. 
*i got my dress for homecoming
*my grandparents are down here visiting and can't believe i am going to homecoming.
*um... i had two major major test in chemistry. we had to memorize 53 ions and their symbols. and well i *suck completely at memorizings. but some how... on the one where we had to go from symbols and write the *name i got a 97 on and today we had to go from name to symbol some how i got a 108. 
*lately the temp has been about 86-88 but today it is only 75. which is actually really nice. 
*i got attacked with a pink carnation at lunch. 
*it was spirit week this week. and yesterday i showed my school spirit and participated in clash day. which is also known as wacky day. i went all out with that. when i get my flim developed i will post a picture. i am sure all of you will find it extremly funny. everyone else did. 
~tomorrow is homecoming... its weird that i am actually a little excited about goings.... i don't know why either. 
~it's almost winter break... which means that i get to go to Erie, PA and to Ohio for a couple of days! yay... i can't wait to see everyone. and for those of you who don't like my hair cut... don't worry it is growing back pretty quick. 
~Dec. 4th i am taking the SAT... which scares me. so that should be interesting. 

that's about all...
um... i want to get a new belly ring. i am tired of the ones i got. lol. i only have 3. i need more. lol. hm... i can't wait until April 7! its my 16th bday! i already took and passed my driving test. i just gotta turn 16. lol. i can't wait until winter break. i miss my family and friends so freaken much. i am so excited to be going back again. 

i think i am out of stuff to type. so i am gonna go.

what's with everyone enjoying picking on me so much? i know it must be fun. but please give me a lil break. i think the teachers are the worst though. me and my chem teacher are now at war. its actaullly quite fun. lol. i think war with my drivers ed teacher is gonna start. he tied my shoes together at lunch. in a really really tight small knot. not fun to under either. fine if they want war... then there will be war. lol.

here is a shocker to some people... even to myself.... i am going to go to Cypress Lake High School's homecoming. Sam + Homecoming = nothing. its weird. i figured why not go. its going to be at Teco Ariena cause the hurricane's stole our gym. the theme is Las Vegas. my friends told me it would be worth it. so it better be. i am actually looking forward to it in a way. a night out. maybe i will start to have a life. who knows. my parents don't know i am going. and i am gonna keep it that way to. i am staying over a friends house and borrowing one of her dresses. we got it planned out.

i still need a job. i need to be working and have something to do. other than rollerblade, draw, work out, talk online, do homework and play video games. i need a life. tomorrow i am gonna go to a Youth in Government meeting. its a club that writes bills and in Febuary goes to the capital and tries to get 'em passed. i figured i'd check it out. maybe it'd be fun.

i was taking out the trash and i was also gonna go work out after i took out the trash. so since i was gonna work out i have a tank top and wind pants on (or whatever the hell you want to call them... the pants that make noise.. swoshy pants.. i don't know) anyways... i am taking the trash out and a guy in a truck passes me... he honks his horn. it scared the hell out of me. it was so freaken lound. i probably jumped so high. 

so now i am here sitting for a lil hoping that pot head leaves the fitness room cause i am not working out with him in there. i am so bored!
I TOOK MY DRIVING TEST TODAY! I PASSED!!!!!! YAY GO ME!!!!!!! I AM SO EXCITED!!!!!!

i am losing everything i had once had. my friends, my life, my dog, everything. its sucks. no one talks to me any more. i though when i moved i wouldn't lose everyone. that some people would still im me or call me. thats why i wouldn't let my dad change his cell phone number. so that my friends could call me on the weekends. but whats the point now. no one talks to me. no one cares any more. i am just kinda stuck here. with nothing at all. no life, no friends, no dog, no parents, nothing. i wish my "friends" would at least call or im me just to at least say hi just to let me know i still have friends. i want to go back to ohio for a couple of days during winter break. but i don't know now. i am not sure i have anything to go back to. or any one. i don't even know where i'd stay or anything. i miss everyone and everything so much. i miss ohio more than anyone could imagine. but it doesn't seem like anyone feels the same about me. everyone moved on and forgot. but i can't. i never will. i have too much stuff to remind me what i regret leaving. i still watch the movie of my surprise going away party. as scary and desturbing that movie is sometimes i still watch it because i miss everyone. i have picture all over my room of different events with everyone. i guess no matter how much i miss it, it wont miss me back. i guess it is true... once you leave you can't go back.

on the bus this morning we were at our last stop. the bus driver opened the door while the people crossed the street and she went to the back of the bus to yell at some kid. while she was walking back there... some kids ran pass the bus and threw eggs in the bus. our bus got egged. i had egg in my hair, neck and face, along with egg shell. so did my sweatshirt. and my bookbag. this one kid got it all of his shirt. it was all over the windows and seats. so we leave and head to school. we get there and the principal is waiting for our bus. he has to search our stuff to make sure it wasn't any of us that threw the eggs. while i am waiting to get my stuff shirt i almost started throwing up. so i went to the bathroom. washed my face and what i could of my hair before i was late for class.

i get to first period. i still have egg in my hair and on my sweeter. everyone is asking what happened so i told my story. then we got our quarter finals back. i new i failed so i didn't bother to look at it. but i still have a b in the class.

next bad part of the day... lunch... my apple juice spilt all over me. so i no longer had only egg on me. but i had apple juice as well. i just wanted to go home even more than. then we had a suprise test in chem. we had to write the periodic table in electron complete configuration. it actually wasn't hard. then the bell rang. time to go home and get the shower i wanted all day.

since my shower i really haven't done nothing besides wash my nasty egg and apple juice cloths. and sit online. pretty boring. veronica is the only one on. where is everyone else?

psat was pretty easy. well i thought so. but it was a long 4 hours. but i had all easy clases left afterwards. like drivers ed, digital design and chem. chem was fun. itis always fun.

tomorrow is the last day of the quarter. i get my quarter final back in ap us history. i dont want it. i bet i failed. o'well. he said it can't kill our grades. no school friday. i am gonna relax. maybe go blading. who knows. i'll probably be bored. this weekend i'll have the cell again. hopefully someone calls. remember its a local number for you people still. im or email me if you need the number.

today my dad bugged for like 1 hour about my web cam. wow it was so annoying. at the end he was just asking me again what i use it for. i got tired of saying the normal things so i decided to freak him out a lil... dont worry about it, its just a lil cam for everyone to see me and see whatever i am doing and so i can have some fun. i like my answer. lol. i love web cams. and no i dont use them for the bad things.

i can't wait for winter break. i got to find some place to stay though when i am in ohio. i can't wait. snow, friends, family and away from my parents. best winter break ever!

okay the browns got their asses kicked by none other than the STEELERS!!! yay. GO STEELERS!!! for all those browns fans out there who is the best now?! sorry i am enjoying this too much. STEELERS ROCK!

anways.... this is the last week in the quarter. it was suppose to be last week but cause of the hurricanes it is this week. today i had a quarter final in ap us history. and tommorrow is the PSAT. a lot going on.

i ordered my class ring. i payed for it myself. and well the stupid lady over charged me 14.90 cause she can't figure out tax. so my dad is gonna go to the place and bitch cause they wont listen to me. oh well. no school friday. maybe i'll go blading again. i went yesterday but i fell cause of two little brats through a stick infront of me and i didn't have enough time to jump or move. it hurt. i still hurt.

i got to find a place to stay winter break if i am able to come to ohio. but it all depends on the weather. cause i would hate to ask my grandparents if the weather is a lil bad. i'd feel bad. so hope that the weather isn't shitty. 

i am really really really really bored.

okay.... last night i found out all my flight info...

i fly to sc on dec 18, from there i fly to erie. then coming home on january 2, i fly to cleveland, then to fl. okay if i get a delay in cleveland someone better be able to come hang out with me!

i don't know if i am gonna be able to come to ohio. it all depends on the weather. if the weather is bad i am not gonna ask my grandparents to drive me to cleveland. if the weather isn't bad then i will.

my parents are already done xmas shopping for me. okay its only october 6! part of my present is my plane ticket. my dad said the other stuff i will like and he wants it to. so i am gonna go insane trying to figure it out.

oh i am getting a class ring! its gonna be awesome. i can't wait. i am so bored. its 6th period. i want the day to be over. i drove yesterday and today in driver's ed. october 13 is psat! and the day after i have a quarter final in ap us history. what is  up with a quarter final. wtf? oh well. i am so bored. i got my new roller blades. but i can't use them yet. damn ankle. i want to be able to go blading. i miss it.

got to go.... i might right more later... someone comment or something! please.

~ this is a special entry today. it is dedicated to some one special. some one who was in 8th grade, attended ford middle school. was in project create, i also believe she played basketball. this if for you Jensyn.  ~

~ life isn't fair. life shouldn't be taken from someone when they are only in 8th grade. it's not right. that's not the way life is suppose to be. My friend and many other's friend passed away today. her name was Jensyn, she had an aneurysm, and was put on life support. and now her life was stolen from her. she wont get to go to her 8th grade farewell, go to high school, attended the high school dances and do whatever she planned on doing after high school. she wont get that choice. Jensyn i am going to miss you a lot. i wish you didn't leave. i am sure everyone else will miss you as well. you still have a place in my heart, and you will always be remembered. ~

well i think i have had the best friday ever. i think i really have. which is weird. but yeah school didn't suck today. i had fun. i was awake and i was hyper. and i got like no homework other than finishing my history project. on top of that people were making me laugh today. which made me feel even better. i am still getting my roller blades. and i might be getting a truck. which yeah i know i can't drive yet without an adult but its one hell of a deal. and sam likes it. sam wants her truck. lol. its a 2004 Dodge Ram 1500 SLT Quad Cab its black. it has like 5,552 miles on it. and its really cheap and nothing wrong with it. sam really wants. and too top it all of my best friend called me. i haven't talked to angela in so long. it felt so nice. i miss talking to her. we talked for like 2 hours. i miss so much being able to do that whenever and not waiting to use the free nights and week end minutes. i swear this is the best friday i have had. my dream truck:

okay here is what went on today.... first period... teacher no show, we sit out in hall for a while... principal comes... lets us in our class... another principal comes... both of them talk... a teacher comes and talks to them... another teacher comes...and talks to us... the other 3 leave.. end of class our teacher comes.... :::fastforeward through boring parts:::: 5th period... librarian decides i am her aid now... okay whatever.... lunch... got yelled i'll miss... kinda made me smile even though it.. was just a joke.... but it was the first time i heard that in a long time.. until people today started reading my xanga... cause i was upset.... ::::fastforewards again::::: bus ride home: some kid told the bus driver fuck you while another one had a joint in his mouth... if you were a bus driver and could only take back one to the school which would ya take back first... if ya said the pot kid then thank you... my bus .... driver took back the other one... that pisses me off. anyways here i am now... a little happy a little sad and a little dissapointed... happy cause someone said i'll miss you... sad cause of what my post that and now my friends start iming me again and a good think is i am getting new roller blades... i think these are the ones i am gonna get...

i don't know what to do about winter break. i want to come back to ohio. and hang out and see everyone and just have fun. but i am not sure if anyone wants me to, no one even talks to me or returns my calls or calls me. everyone knows the cell number, i have it every weekend as long as my dad is working even if he isn't i still have it cause i am normally with him. and its a local number for everyone. not even my best friends talk to me. i keep thinking that they are just busy with school and other things. i hope that is it. i dont want it to be anything else. i don't know. i wish someone would talk to me. life would be so much easier if i could just go back and never of moved. but i can't. and now i am losing or have already lost everything i once had, my dog, my friends, my life. this all sucks more than anything else. more then most people can understand.  i hate this so much. i want to go back. i want my life back. i want my friends back. i want everything back. what hurts more is that people who haven't even met me talk to me but my friends that i have known for like ever don't even talk to me.

i dont know.. lately i have felt like i dont have a place any more. i use to have a place inside my group. i don't think i do any more. no one talks to me any more. besides a couple of people every now and then. my best friends don't even talk to me that much. i feel like i dont belong any were. it sucks. i sit in my room and look around. i just see pictures of old memories and friends. and my old group. i thought i was still apart of it. but i guess i was wrong. i never know what is going on. unless i can find out from everyone's xanga. i want to come back winter break for a couple of days. but i am just not sure that there is anything to come back to. i love and care about everyone so much and i miss everyone like crazy. but i think i am forgotten. i may be wrong... but when no one ims you or calls you and you don't know what's going on with anyone. and when you try to have a convo with someone they only thing you get out of them is hey and what's up. i have had a conversation with someone i dont know at all online and we talked for at least an hour. yet the people i have known for what feels like forever can't have a conversation for 5 minutes. right now i am sitting here crying because i feel like i have lost everyone i really care about.

hurricane ivan is over... i hope. but another storm is developing. its like let see how many hurricanes it takes to destroy florida. not kidding.

i am so tired. i had a chemistry test today. i got 101 % on it. yay. i lost my pencil. i had it for 4 years and never lost it until today. i am sad. it was a really good pencil. i got to find a new one. just like it. i have had an off day. i woke up... left... forgot my notebook and folder and hoodie. so i ran back and got it. and forgot to grab my hoodie. so i froze all day. then lost my pencil. and here i am now. tired, stressed, not awake, and bored.

that is some scary stuff. and it turned more towards us. yeah i am freaken. we can't evacuate because of my parents gays ass jobs. i am scared as hell. i spend most of the day home alone. i am stressing so much my uclers are bugging me more and it feels like someone put a clamp on my head. i hate this so freaken much! god dammit it all needs to go away. 

hm.. today i had the cell again. i got two phone calls. amazing. that's like a record. normally no one calls me. i got a call from aaron. and one from angela. thanks guys.

i am so bored. there is nothing to do. i did like nothing all day. no one called me all day. i got 2 calls yesterday. but zero today. i wish someone would call me! tomorrow i am gonna be really bored. no school and no place to go. i guess i'll do my hw if i get really bored.

Missing.. By: Sam Chiaramonte(that's me!)

I miss it once. 
I miss it twice. 
I miss everything I had at one point. 
Everything that I worked for. 
Everything that I had.
It's all gone. 
But I want it all back. 
Everything that ment something to me is fading away. 
I want it all to be clear again. 
Everything that I had, 
everything that I wanted, 
it is all disappearing. 
I want to go back. 
Yet I can't. 
Not right now,
But not forever, 
just for a little while. 
Someday I'll be back. 
But will everything be the way I left it?

Gone... By: Sam Chiaramonte(that's me!)

The world keeps turning,
But I'm not moving. 
Everything is passing by. 
Not letting me catch up.
I'm being left behind,
Left alone in the dark.
With no one to lend a hand.
Or show me a light.
To get me out of a hole 6 feet under.
I can't find my way out of a hole so deep.
I am leaving.
I am disappearing.
It's like I am already gone.
Just fill in the hole.
And leave me there to be alone. 

Mistake... By: Sam Chiaramonte(that's me!)

I made a mistake that I can't take back,
There's been more than one to take back,
More than one in my life.
One big mistake is my life.
But you can't change a mistakes that has been made.
You have to work with them to make them better.
But they can never be good.
Then what do you do?
Is there anyway to fix a mistake as big as mine?
Anyway to be happy when you don't know what that is?
How can you be happy when something is missing inside?
What if the puzzle pieces don't fit?
The world has given up on me.
It's no longer spinning with me but with out, 
The door doesn't have a key.
So I am left out.
Where do I belong?
Not here nor there,
Everyone makes mistakes,
What do you do when you are one of them?
Sometimes you just want to cry and make yourself a lake,
Sometimes you need a hand but no one is there,
Someone please help me,
Lead me in the right direction,
Away from all the mistakes that have been made,
And I have been blamed.
The mistakes need to be taken away.
Be gone for good.

Care... By: Sam Chiaramonte(that's me!)

I take a look around,
Looking for someone who cares,
I find no one there.
I go online looking for someone who cares,
And no one is there.
So where are the ones who care?
I can't find them. 
I know there has to be someone.
But where?
Before when I needed someone they were always there.
Now they are never there.
Am I really here?
Do I exist any more?
Why am I always the one looking for someone to care?
Why can't they find me?
I just want someone to care about me.
Others wise I don't have a reason to be here.
If no one cares,
And no one can help.
Then why am i here?
Just to suffer,
I need someone to care,
And find me a way out of this.

last night i couldn't sleep. okay life has just sucked and wont stop. its annoying as hell. i mean okay i guess i was like 11 or 12 when i first found out that i hated life so much because i had depression. but we never really did anything about it. i just continued to put on a fake happy face for everyone. it got harder over the years. then last december for the first time i didn't hate life but it still sucked. but there were small things that i enjoyed. then i moved. my life turned to a burning hell. and that's where i am at today. but this time i have made some friends and the school doesn't suck ass. well my parents decided they wanted to move to New Port Richey. it's up by tampa. i tried to act excited and happy. didn't work to well. i told my dad today that he can't keep moving me around and expecting me to leave everything behind. he is just making my life just that much difficult. so he said that he doesn't want to move either but its a good opperatunity. but he doesnn't want to do it if it is gonna effect me again like it did last january. so hopefully we don't move.

and my dad decided that he is gonna help me as much as possible to go to college. which shoocked the hell out of me. i never expected that ever. last time we talked about college it was me paying for it. now he wants me to pay the minimum and not worry about the cost but to go to a college that is good for me and that i want to go to. first thought that came to me "who are you and what the hell have you done with my dad" okay one me and my dad haven't had a convosation without us ending up fighting and me locking him out of my room in god knows how long. second when the hell did my dad decided to start helping me? this is not like my dad at all. so it's really weird. oh and i was gonna get a laptop. but he wants me to wait until after i get a car and then he'll help me get an even nicer one. i was thinking "are you feeling alright" okay no one in my family had ever helped me really in life. especially my dad. maybe he feels bad for never being there. ya know my dad just figured out not to long ago that i am a tom boy. and he just remembered in like february that i have extremly bad depression. so it's weird for my dad to try to help me for once.
